thread.title: BRIEF-Baxter International-‍​On Jan 1,Administrative Committee Of Compensation Committee Of Board Approved Amendment To Reorganize Co's, Units Pension Plan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Baxter International-‍​On Jan 1,Administrative Committee Of Compensation Committee Of Board Approved Amendment To Reorganize Co's, Units Pension Plan

organizations.name: administrative committee of compensation committee of board approved amendment to reorganize co

text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Baxter International Inc:
* BAXTER INTERNATIONAL-‍​ON JAN 1,ADMINISTRATIVE COMMITTEE OF COMPENSATION COMMITTEE OF BOARD APPROVED AMENDMENT TO REORGANIZE CO‘S,UNITS PENSION PLAN
* BAXTER INTERNATIONAL - EFFECTIVE JAN 1, AMENDMENT SPUN OFF ASSETS,LIABILITIES OF U.S. PENSION PLAN ATTRIBUTABLE TO CURRENT CO EMPLOYEES TO NEW CO PLAN
* BAXTER- AFTER CONTRIBUTIONS OF $115 MILLION TO U.S. PENSION PLAN IN Q4 2017 & FREEZE, EXPECTS U.S. PENSION PLAN NEARLY FULLY FUNDED AS OF DEC 31, 2017 Source text ( bit.ly/2EmBcea ) Further company coverage:
